Prompt.description: The prompt for the viewer when they are redeeming the reward

Cost.description: The cost of the reward in channel points

IsEnabled.description: Is the reward currently enabled, if false the reward won’t show up to viewers. Defaults to true if not specified.

BackgroundColor.description: Custom background color for the reward. Format: Hex with # prefix. Example: #00E5CB.

IsUserInputRequired.description: Does the user need to enter information when redeeming the reward. Defaults false.

MaxPerStream.description: The maximum number per stream, defaults to unlimited

MaxPerUserPerStream.description: The maximum number per user per stream, defaults to unlimited

GlobalCooldownSeconds.description: The cooldown in seconds, defaults to unlimited

Name.description: The command itself, not including the !

HideHelp.description: Hides the command from the !help action

Help.description: What to show in the !help command

BroadcasterOnly.description: Only allows the broadcaster to use this command, and hides it from !help

ModOnly.description: Only allows the mods or broadcaster to use this command, and hides it from !help

Handler.description: The name of the BLT command handler

HandlerConfig.description: The custom config for the command handler
